biography: Sarah Jones was born on November 29, 1973 in Baltimore, Maryland, USA. She is a Tony-winning performer and comedian known for her multi-character, one-person shows, Broadway hit Bridge & Tunnel, originally produced by Meryl Streep, and the critically-acclaimed Sell/Buy/Date. Jones recently launched Foment Productions, a social justice-focused entertainment company. Sell/Buy/Date is her directorial debut.
name: Sarah Jones
